title: FS: NM T206s for VG+ Prices
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: FS: NM T206s for VG+ Prices
posts.post_content:
Okay - there has to be a catch right --- of course, this is America, isn't it!

All of these great cards look at least Ex/Mt with some NM.  But all have some staining on the back.  All things considered amazing eye-appeal for the grade (they are all T206 slabbed PSA2) - sorry a T205 sneaked past me.

Now priced individually -- or impress me with a trade.

Cards are:
Brown - washington variation - $190
Evers - chicago batting - SOLD
Griffith - bat on shoulder STUNNING CARD - $125
Lajoie - batting another STUNNING CARD! - SOLD
Tinker bat off shoulder - $135

Now priced individually

Also --- would anyone recommend a submit to SCG or beckett?  Seeing how other '2s' look, it just seems a bit silly to have these slabbed with that grade I suppose.
